an3.83:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati paṭikacceva khettaṁ sukaṭṭhaṁ karoti sumatikataṁ.
an3.83:1.4: Paṭikacceva khettaṁ sukaṭṭhaṁ karitvā sumatikataṁ kālena bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
an3.83:1.5: Kālena bījāni patiṭṭhāpetvā samayena udakaṁ abhinetipi apanetipi.
an3.83:1.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi kassakassa gahapatissa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
an3.83:2.1: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tīṇimāni bhikkhussa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
an3.83:2.4: imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bhikkhussa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
an3.83:3.2: ‘tibbo no chando bhavissati adhisīlasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhicittasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhipaññāsikkhāsamādāne’ti.
